MemberSignature.Value: public static string SanitizeKey (string key);
.method public static hidebysig string SanitizeKey(string key) cil managed
Public Shared Function SanitizeKey (key As String) As String
static member SanitizeKey : string -> string

Docs.summary: Converts the key into a DocumentID that can be used safely with CosmosDB. The following characters are restricted and cannot be used in the Id property: '/', '\', '?', '#' More information at https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/microsoft.azure.documents.resource.id?view=azure-dotnet#remarks.
Docs.returns: A sanitized key that can be used safely with CosmosDB.
